channel.title: Drop trade?
channel.description: I was wondering if it's still possible to drop trade between accounts on runescape. Because i tried dropping one of my glories to see if i was allowed to drop it, and i could. So would that make Real World Trading possible? Would that ruin the entire affect of the update? Tell me if i'm wrong please.

item.title: Drop trade?
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:19, topic:170547”][quote author=Not X A Alex link=topic=230492.msg2007762#msg2007762 date=1200960679]
I think you should just quit. Trust me. I have a life now.
[/quote]Oh, don’t lie to the man.[/quote]
He just did.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop trade?
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

Hiaburi:

WTH! they actually made it so u can’t drop cash when you die? I am finally a high enough level to pk in he wild and make some cash and now I can’t do it? thats the worst update ever, i mean drop trading between your accounts doesn’t hurt anything anyways…

I think you should just quit. Trust me. I have a life now.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop trade?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Hiaburi:

WTH! they actually made it so u can’t drop cash when you die? I am finally a high enough level to pk in he wild and make some cash and now I can’t do it? thats the worst update ever, i mean drop trading between your accounts doesn’t hurt anything anyways…

Gold farmers can’t transfer money to you anymore. They could do it via drop trading, but with that disabled they cant anymore.

Read full topic

xxlegitxx:

Taharok, do you not understand it? They macro on your account when you’re not online so you get money.

item.title: Drop trade?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

ninja nub:

The new way they do it now is gold farm on your account.

What would be the point of that? People used to buy gold for their mains. Now all they can do is buy mains since pking is dead…

And I do believe the quest point count has an effect on the whole trading system, by which drop trading is probably also included. (the dropping system generally)

Read full topic

item.title: Drop trade?
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:8, topic:170547”]I’ve wondered if you die, is it still impossible to trade items from death?

E.g. get poisoned at low hp, go to somewhere secret with lots of money on, then die and bring your other account along and wait till the gravestone disappears. Then do all the items get dropped?[/quote]

Anything over 3K wont show up to other ppl but you

Read full topic

item.title: Drop trade?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:7, topic:170547”][quote author=musicmad441 link=topic=230492.msg1985724#msg1985724 date=1199830551]
What happens if you have like 200 qp’s, does this rule still apply?

~Musicmad
[/quote]

Can you not read?

[quote author=.Kaboom link=topic=230492.msg1974455#msg1974455 date=1199419125]
Anything over 3K that you drop doesn’t show to anyone but you.
[/quote][/quote]

That might not be true, that may only be someone with 0 guest points.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop trade?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I’ve wondered if you die, is it still impossible to trade items from death?

E.g. get poisoned at low hp, go to somewhere secret with lots of money on, then die and bring your other account along and wait till the gravestone disappears. Then do all the items get dropped?
